select
from repeater_request_folder request_folder left join repeater_request_detail request_detail on request_detail.folder_id=request_folder.id and request_detail.user_id =request_folder.user_id where 1=1
and (request_detail.name like CONCAT('%',#{kw},'%') or request_folder.name like CONCAT('%',#{kw},'%'))
order by request_folder.id desc ,request_detail.id desc
